quote: Yesterday's the past, tomorrow's the future, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.
author: Bil Keane

quote: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances; and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Time and tide wait for no man.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
author: John Wooden

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no laziness, no procrastination: never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Time moves in one direction, memory in another.
author: William Gibson

quote: There are no secrets that time does not reveal.
author: Jean Racine

quote: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: Put two ships in the open sea, without wind or tide, and, at last, they will come together. Throw two planets into space, and they will fall one on the other. Place two enemies in the midst of a crowd, and they will inevitably meet; it is a fatality, a question of time; that is all.
author: Jules Verne

quote: What then is time? If no one asks me, I know what it is. If I wish to explain it to him who asks, I do not know.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
author: John Lennon

quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Procrastination is the thief of time.
author: Edward Young

quote: Lost - yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered, for they are gone forever.
author: Horace Mann

quote: No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The past cannot be cured.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: In times like these, it helps to recall that there have always been times like these.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: It is strange that the years teach us patience; that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: At the end of your life, you will never regret not having passed one more test, not winning one more verdict or not closing one more deal. You will regret time not spent with a husband, a friend, a child, or a parent.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
author: Dion Boucicault

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
author: Giordano Bruno

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of 60 minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: Let the refining and improving of your own life keep you so busy that you have little time to criticize others.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: Time goes, you say? Ah, no! alas, time stays, we go.
author: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
author: Faith Baldwin

quote: We are so obsessed with doing that we have no time and no imagination left for being. As a result, men are valued not for what they are but for what they do or what they have - for their usefulness.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Time is the most valuable thing on earth: time to think, time to act, time to extend our fraternal relations, time to become better men, time to become better women, time to become better and more independent citizens.
author: Samuel Gompers

quote: People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.
author: John Wanamaker

quote: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed; it has advanced and set us in motion; it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.
author: Evelyn Waugh

quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
author: Adam Hochschild

quote: Time sometimes flies like a bird, sometimes crawls like a snail; but a man is happiest when he does not even notice whether it passes swiftly or slowly.
author: Ivan Turgenev

quote: Lost wealth may be replaced by industry, lost knowledge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone forever.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: Forever is composed of nows.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
author: Michael LeBoeuf

quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Time and memory are true artists; they remould reality nearer to the heart's desire.
author: John Dewey

quote: Lose not yourself in a far off time, seize the moment that is thine.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Time will pass and seasons will come and go.
author: Roy Bean

quote: It is my feeling that Time ripens all things; with Time all things are revealed; Time is the father of truth.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Time = Life, Therefore, waste your time and waste of your life, or master your time and master your life.
author: Alan Lakein
